txt1: Predict the winners. Guess it Right!
txt3: Consolation prizes include, Mountain Bike, Apple Watches, Samsung Watches, Adidas Footballs, Adidas Gift Certificates and Nike Gift Certificates!
txt9:
• Pre-register by entering your correct EMAIL.
  • Join the predictions by selecting teams that will reach the Quarterfinals, Semifinals, Finals and the team who’ll be the Champion.
  • A copy of your predictions will be sent to your email registered in the promo.
  • Predictions are open from June 01 to June 11, 2021.
  • Selection of winners is based on the time and date stamp of prediction submissions. Only the latest prediction will be honored for multiple entries.
txt11:
• This promotion will run from June 01, 2021 at 00:00:00 until June 11 2021 at 23:59:00 (GMT+8).

  • This promotion is open for new players who registered during the promotion period and is limited to the first 500 registrations ONLY.

  • To be eligible, a player must first input their “real” email via the pop-up form before the game. The email will be used as information to record the prize won and to claim the prize.

  • On the game, the player will need to enter the predicted teams who will play for the QUARTERFINALS, SEMIFINALS, FINALS and be the CHAMPION and SUBMIT their prediction.

  • Once the prediction has been submitted, the player will be redirected to the M88 website to complete registration to validate their prediction.

  • There will be a total of 10 players to win this prediction. Prizes to be won are shown below:

    ROUNDNUMBER OF WINNERSPRIZE per WINNER
    Quarterfinals10$5,000
    Semifinals5$5,000
    Finals2$10,000
    CHAMPION1$30,000
    TOTAL10$50,000

  • Only the FIRST 10 players who have correctly predicted the QUARTERFINALS ROUND will be eligible to continue to the next round - SEMIFINALS, FINALS and CHAMPION. Lower prize brackets need to be won before higher prizes. This means the player who gets the correct prediction for CHAMPION needs to also have predicted the correct Finals, Semifinals, and Quarterfinals.

  • Identification of winners will be based on the DATE AND TIME of their LAST created prediction.

  • Eligible winners are those players who have completed the minimum requirement of this promotion:

    - minimum requirement to register from M88 Winning Kicks
    - Created an account with M88 website
    - Made a minimum deposit of $10/THB300/VND250/IDR200/MYR50

  • Prediction winners will have their prizes credited to their M88 wallets. QUARTERFINALS ONLY winner will receive $5,000. QUARTERFINALS + SEMIFINALS winners will receive $10,000. QUARTERFINALS + SEMIFINALS + FINALS winners will get $20,000. QUARTERFINALS + SEMIFINALS + FINALS + CHAMPION winner will receive $50,000. See below RO requirements for withdrawal:

    • QUARTERFINALS: $5000 with 1x RO
    • QUARTERFINALS + SEMIFINALS: $10,000 with 1x RO
    • QUARTERFINALS + SEMIFINALS + FINALS: $20,000 with 1x RO
    • QUARTERFINALS + SEMIFINALS + FINALS + CHAMPION: $50,000 with 1x RO

  • There will a total of 100 winners for the consolation prizes.

    Number of WINNERSPRIZES
    1Mountain Bike
    3Apple Watch
    6Samsung Watch
    30Adidas Football
    30$88 Adidas Gift Certificate
    30$88 Nike Gift Certificate

  • Player can earn more raffle entries for each $10/THB300/VND250/IDR200/MYR50 they deposit.

  • Bonuses will be inserted after have concluded on July 12. Allow 24-48 hours for bonus insertion. Players may claim physical prizes within 7 days from the end of the Euros.

  • Players registered under this campaign are eligible for the M88 Welcome Bonus Bundle.

  • Physical prizes if unclaimed for 7 days will be forfeited.

  • Physical prizes such as the mountain bike, Apple watch, Samsung watch, football and gift certificates can be converted to cash bonus amounting to 50% of the actual value with 8 x RO requirement before they can withdraw their money.

  • A player can submit multiple entries but only the last created predictions will be counted and the contact information MUST match his M88 registration.

  • All draw bets, void bets, bets placed on, Bets on Decimal odds below 1.50 (malay odds 0.50; HK odds 0.50; Indo Odds -2.00) and all bets on excluded games will not be included in the calculation for any turnover and rollover requirement.

  • Rollover must be fulfilled within 7 days to prevent forfeiture of the bonus and winning amount.

  • Withdrawal will not be processed if you still have an active rollover. Please contact Customer Service to arrange for a waiver of the roll-over requirement.

  • M88 reserves the right to change, update, modify or cancel this promotion anytime.

  • General Terms & Conditions of Promotions apply.
